Movie & Dining: BOGO on Movie Tickets Upto ₹500. This Can Be Availed Twice Each Month
Rewards Rate: 10X Reward Points/₹150 on Incremental Spends Above ₹20,000 Per Statement Cycle. 5X Reward Points/₹150 on Spends Upto ₹20,000. 3X RPs Are Also Awarded for Rent, Wallet Load, Education, and Government Transactions
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = ₹0.50 for Travel Bookings Via IDFC Travel & Shop. 1 RP = ₹0.25 Everywhere Else
Travel: 4 Complimentary Railway Lounge Access Each Quarter
Domestic Lounge Access: 4 Free Visits Across the Country Each Quarter, 16 in a Year. One Additional Free Guest Visit Each Quarter
International Lounge Access: 4 Free Visits Each Quarter, 16 in a Year
Golf: 2 Free Golf Rounds/Golf Lessons Each Month
Insurance Benefits: Purchase Protection, Travel Insurance, Free Trip Cancellation, and Personal Accident Cover

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver on Transactions Between ₹200 and ₹5,000 (Maximum ₹300 Per Statement Cycle)

product_details: The Mayura Credit Card is a premium credit card that comes at a fee of ₹5,999.
This card offers 10X Reward Points on incremental spends of ₹20,000 or above.
Cardholders can access both international and domestic airport lounges with this card.
Availing this card is relatively easy; one can also apply for this on a card-to-card basis.
